about_the_game:
[Game Play Streaming and Video Production Guide]

1. Modifying game code or manipulating game contents by reverse engineering, hacking, etc

2. Claiming that the content is officially approved and produced without prior consultation with the development team

If you comply with the above, we allow disclosure and monetization through video production or streaming regardless of individuals or corporations.

Please post a link to the store page in the outline column.

Experience the Joy of Puzzle Solving by Changing Pa!nt’s Colors!

Your journey in "Pa!nt" begins in the Doodle world. You will embark on a journey into the Doodle world alongside your small and adorable friend, Moonie, who was born from doodles in the notebook.

Solve stages filled with puzzles made from doodles together with Moonie!

Each notebook is composed of stages built around Gimmicks that follow a specific theme. Challenge yourself with new Gimmicks and stages in every notebook!

Meet Our Friend, Moonie

Moonie is a small and adorable octopus doodle born in the Doodle world.

Moonie can pass through areas of the same color but not through different colors.

Change Moonie's color!

Don’t worry if Moonie can’t pass through a different color—just use a paint bucket to change Moonie's color!

A Home Screen You Design Yourself

Moonie’s Page in Pa!nt is another world that you can create yourself.

As you clear more notebooks, the once plain notebook will become more vibrant and colorful!

Four Special Gimmicks

The notebooks in Pa!nt each have their own special Gimmicks.

In addition to the basic paint, you can discover a total of four new Gimmicks in Pa!nt.

Each Gimmick can change Moonie’s color, move Moonie around, and add more fun to the puzzles. Experience the various Gimmicks and solve puzzles using them!

Also, play through the notebooks to unlock the Gimmicks and customize your own notebook!

60 Stages and Endless Content with the Map Editor

In Pa!nt, you can currently explore a total of 60 stages.

Use the various Gimmicks you earn while playing through all the stages to create your own unique page!

It’s not just about playing alone—enjoy the experience together by creating and sharing stages, and immerse yourself in the charm of Pa!nt.

Try out the new "Black and White" mode in Pa!nt.

Enjoy puzzles designed around colors, but experience them without the colors! Even though it’s monochrome, the unique fun of "Black and White" mode will surely keep you entertained!!

As you play through various stages, decorate Moonie!

While traveling through different stages in Pa!nt, you'll eventually earn a variety of outfits. Use the clothes you collect to customize Moonie and make it truly one of a kind!

highlighted.name: The one who turns back time
Oh... I think I almost figured it out
The 50th chance of my whole life

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest macOS
  • Processor: Core i5-9400F equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660S equivalent or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pa!nt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the puzzle platformer "Pa!nt," your journey starts in a doodle world. Solve puzzles by changing colors, themed around Gimmicks that hold imaginations and memories, and face new experiences and challenges with each new notebook.
